label: Do you treat your mail and/or delivered packages differently now than you did before the pandemic? Select all that apply.
value_constraints: Yes, I sanitize these items (with a wipe, alcohol, or other agent);Yes, I deliberately wait for a period of time before touching them;Yes, I use gloves or other physical protective barrier when I open them;Yes, in other ways not described here;No;Other

label: In the past WEEK, have you visited a church, synagogue, mosque, temple, or other place of worship?
In the past WEEK, about how many times have you visited a place of worship?
